issues.issue_text: We should be acting to stop the damage to our environment
Protect and improve the Affordable Care Act
I've repeatedly brought utility and environmental leaders from across the state to the same table, to figure out how we can move ahead
This year's proposed campus budget cuts were, as one president put it, draconian. We must do better.
We should turn to HSAs to protect the citizens of kentucky
a world-class education is the best way we can prepare our children for the twenty-first century workforce.
I support gun owners and will stand up for our God-given Second Amendment rights.
Folks here in Western Kentucky deserve access to quality health care. Obamacare is not the answer and will continue to hurt small businesses, individuals and our overall economy.
